Command.Name: ButtonNew
Command.TooltipDescription: Create new Mind Map (Ctrl + N)

Command.Name: ButtonOpen
Command.TooltipDescription: Open existing Mind Map (Ctrl + O)

Command.Name: ButtonSave
Command.TooltipDescription: Save current map (Ctrl + S)

Command.Name: SaveAs
Command.TooltipDescription: Save As a new file

Command.Name: Close
Command.TooltipDescription: Close current Mind Map

Command.Name: ButtonExit
Command.TooltipDescription: Exit application (Alt + F4)

Command.Name: NewChildNode
Command.TooltipDescription: Create new child node (Tab)

Command.Name: NewLongNode
Command.TooltipDescription: Create a multi-line child node

Command.Name: NewNodeAbove
Command.TooltipDescription: Create sibling node above (Shift + Enter)

Command.Name: NewNodeBelow
Command.TooltipDescription: Create sibling node below (Enter)

Command.Name: NewNodeParent
Command.TooltipDescription: Create a new node between curent node and it's parent

Command.Name: EditText
Command.TooltipDescription: Edit text of the node (F2)

Command.Name: EditLong
Command.TooltipDescription: Edit text of node in multi-line editor (Alt + Enter)

Command.Name: DeleteNode
Command.TooltipDescription: Edit selected node(s) (Del)

Command.Name: Paste
Command.TooltipDescription: Paste (Ctrl + V)

Command.Name: PasteAsImage
Command.TooltipDescription: Paste copied files as images rather than links

Command.Name: Cut
Command.TooltipDescription: Cut (Ctrl + X)

Command.Name: Copy
Command.TooltipDescription: Copy (Ctrl + C)

Command.Name: BackColor
Command.TooltipDescription: Make text look like it was marked with a highlighter pen.

Command.Name: ClearFormatting
Command.TooltipDescription: Remove all formatting like font and color from the selected nodes.

Command.Name: RemoveLastIcon
Command.TooltipDescription: Remove recently added icon from selected node(s)

Command.Name: RemoveAllIcons
Command.TooltipDescription: Remove all icons from the selected node(s)

Command.Name: LaunchIconsDialog
Command.TooltipDescription: Launch Icons Dialog to select or customize icons

Command.Name: SelectAll
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all nodes

Command.Name: SelectSiblings
Command.TooltipDescription:
Select all siblings of selected node.
Note:
- Select all siblings above (Shift + Page Up) - Select all siblings below (Shift + Page Down)

Command.Name: SelectAncestors
Command.TooltipDescription: Select parent and grandparents of the selected node

Command.Name: SelectChildren
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all children

Command.Name: SelectDescendents
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents i.e. branch

Command.Name: SelectDescendentsUpto1
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents upto depth 1 (i.e. children)

Command.Name: SelectDescendentsUpto2
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents upto depth 2

Command.Name: SelectDescendentsUpto3
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents upto depth 3

Command.Name: SelectDescendentsUpto4
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents upto depth 4

Command.Name: SelectDescendentsUpto5
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all descendents upto depth 5

Command.Name: ExpandOnSelect
Command.TooltipDescription: Only visible nodes are selected if not checked

Command.Name: SelectLevel
Command.TooltipDescription: Select all nodes at a certain level from center

Command.Name: SelectLevel1
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at level(depth) 1 from center

Command.Name: SelectLevel2
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at level(depth) 2 from center

Command.Name: SelectLevel3
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at level(depth) 3 from center

Command.Name: SelectLevel4
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at level(depth) 4 from center

Command.Name: SelectLevel5
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at level(depth) 5 from center

Command.Name: SelectLevelCurrent
Command.TooltipDescription: Select nodes at the level of current node

Command.Name: ExpandAll
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand all nodes recursively

Command.Name: CollapseAll
Command.TooltipDescription: Collapse all nodes recursively

Command.Name: ToggleCurrent
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse current node (Space)

Command.Name: ToggleBranch
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse current node and descendents recursively

Command.Name: ExpandMapToCurrentLevel
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to the level of currently selected node

Command.Name: ExpandMapToLevel1
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to level 1

Command.Name: ExpandMapToLevel2
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to level 2

Command.Name: ExpandMapToLevel3
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to level 3

Command.Name: ExpandMapToLevel4
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to level 4

Command.Name: ExpandMapToLevel5
Command.TooltipDescription: Expand / Collapse map to level 5

Command.Name: MoveUp
Command.TooltipDescription: Move the selected node up (Ctrl + Up)

Command.Name: MoveDown
Command.TooltipDescription: Move the selected node down (Ctrl + Down)

Command.Name: SortAlphabetic
Command.TooltipDescription: Sort children in alphabetical order

Command.Name: SortDueDate
Command.TooltipDescription: Sort children by Due or Completion date of tasks

Command.Name: SortNodeCount
Command.TooltipDescription: Sort children by number of descendents

Command.Name: SortModifiedDate
Command.TooltipDescription: Sort children by last modified date

Command.Name: SortCreateDate
Command.TooltipDescription: Sort children by creatin date

Command.Name: SortOrder
Command.TooltipDescription: Click to toggle sort order: Ascending or Descending

Command.Name: Undo
Command.TooltipDescription: Undo changes (Ctrl + Z)

Command.Name: Redo
Command.TooltipDescription: Redo changes (Ctrl + Y)

Command.Name: Hyperlink
Command.TooltipTitle: Add or Edit hyperlink using Text Field (Ctrl + K)
Command.TooltipDescription: Hyperlink to website or local file

Command.Name: HyperlinkFile
Command.TooltipTitle: Add or Edit hyperlink using File Dialog (Ctrl + Shift + K)
Command.TooltipDescription: Hyperlink to website or local file

Command.Name: HyperlinkFolder
Command.TooltipTitle: Add or Edit hyperlink using Folder Dialog
Command.TooltipDescription: Hyperlink to website or local file

Command.Name: AddTask
Command.TooltipDescription: Add task to selected node(s) using Date Picker ...

Command.Name: AddTaskToday
Command.TooltipDescription: Add task to selected node(s) due today

Command.Name: AddTaskTomorrow
Command.TooltipDescription: Add task to selected node(s) due tomorrow

Command.Name: AddTaskNextWeek
Command.TooltipDescription: Add task to selected node(s) due next week

Command.Name: AddTaskNextMonth
Command.TooltipDescription: Add task to selected node(s) due next month

Command.Name: AddTaskNextQuarter
Command.TooltipDescription: Add task to selected node(s) due next quarter

Command.Name: CompleteTask
Command.TooltipDescription: Mark task as completed for selected node(s)

Command.Name: RemoveTask
Command.TooltipDescription: Remove tasks from selected node(s)

Command.Name: ClearShapeFormat
Command.TooltipDescription: Clear the shape format and use default

Command.Name: DefaultFormatSettings
Command.TooltipDescription:
Open settings dialog for default font, color etc.
The settings will apply on the current document. Each document can have their own settings.

Command.Name: SetSelectedAsDefaultFormat
Command.TooltipDescription: Set formatting of the selected node as the default formatting for the map.

Command.Name: ApplyTheme
Command.TooltipDescription: Apply theme to the current map.

Command.Name: ViewCalendar
Command.TooltipDescription: Open calendar window to view tasks from open maps.

Command.Name: ViewTaskList
Command.TooltipDescription: Bring Task List into view (Only shows tasks upto next month).

Command.Name: ViewNote
Command.TooltipDescription: Bring Note into view.

Command.Name: IncreaseImageSize
Command.TooltipDescription: Increase image size

Command.Name: DecreaseImageSize
Command.TooltipDescription: Decrease image size

Command.Name: GrpImageAlign
Command.TooltipDescription: Align image to the node text

Command.Name: ImageAlignStart
Command.TooltipDescription: Align image to the start of text

Command.Name: ImageAlignCenter
Command.TooltipDescription: Align image to the center of text

Command.Name: ImageAlignEnd
Command.TooltipDescription: Align image to the end of text

Command.Name: GrpImagePosition
Command.TooltipDescription: Position of image relative to the text

Command.Name: ImagePosAbove
Command.TooltipDescription: Position image above the text

Command.Name: ImagePosBefore
Command.TooltipDescription: Position image before the text

Command.Name: ImagePosBelow
Command.TooltipDescription: Position image below the text

Command.Name: ImagePosAfter
Command.TooltipDescription: Position image after the text

Command.Name: Bullets
Command.TooltipDescription: Start a bulleted list.

Command.Name: Numbers
Command.TooltipDescription: Start a numbered list.

Command.Name: AlignLeft
Command.TooltipDescription: Align text to the left.

Command.Name: AlignRight
Command.TooltipDescription: Align text to the right.

Command.Name: AlignCenter
Command.TooltipDescription: Center text.

Command.Name: Justify
Command.TooltipDescription: Align text to both left and right margins, adding extra space between words as necessary.

Command.Name: Indent
Command.Comment: Increase the indent level of the paragraph
Command.TooltipDescription: Increase the indent level of the paragraph

Command.Name: Outdent
Command.Comment: Decrease the indent level of the paragraph
Command.TooltipDescription: Decrease the indent level of the paragraph

Command.Name: RTLTextBlock
Command.TooltipDescription: Makes the direction of the selected text right-to-left.

Command.Name: LTRTextBlock
Command.TooltipDescription: Makes the direction of the selected text left-to-right.

Command.Name: NoteHeading1
Command.TooltipDescription: Apply Heading 1 text style.

Command.Name: NoteHeading2
Command.TooltipDescription: Apply Heading 2 text style.

Command.Name: NoteHeading3
Command.TooltipDescription: Apply Heading 3 text style.

Command.Name: NoteNormal
Command.TooltipDescription: Apply Normal text style.

Command.Name: NoteInsertTable
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert a table in the Note.

Command.Name: NoteInsertImage
Command.TooltipDescription: Select an Image file to be inserted in note.

Command.Name: NoteCleanHtml
Command.TooltipDescription:
Cleans HTML copied from the web.
- removes input controls - removes absolute positioning and sizes

Command.Name: NoteEditHtml
Command.TooltipDescription: Edit Html source code for the note.

Command.Name: ModifyTableProperties
Command.TooltipDescription: Edit table properties.

Command.Name: DeleteRow
Command.TooltipDescription: Remove the selected row.

Command.Name: DeleteColumn
Command.TooltipDescription: Remove the selected column.

Command.Name: DeleteTable
Command.TooltipDescription: Delete the table.

Command.Name: InsertRowAbove
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert a row above the current position.

Command.Name: InsertRowBelow
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert a row below the current position.

Command.Name: InsertColumnLeft
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert a column to the left of the current position.

Command.Name: InsertColumnRight
Command.TooltipDescription: Insert a column to the right of the current position.

Command.Name: MoveRowUp
Command.TooltipDescription: Swap the current row with the one above.

Command.Name: MoveRowDown
Command.TooltipDescription: Swap the current row with the one below.

Command.Name: MoveColumnLeft
Command.TooltipDescription: Swap the selected column with the one to the left.

Command.Name: MoveColumnRight
Command.TooltipDescription: Swap the selected column with the one to the right.
